title: Signs of the times: Carlyle
brief_description: SUMMARY: Prof. G. Best, Sir Richard Lodge Professor of History at the University of Edinburgh, talks about the Victorian social critic, Thomas Carlyle. It is no sense a biography of Carlyle but rather a review of the newly industrialised England which Car
